'''Moon in One's Cup''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a default tune in the [[Euphonium Unbound]] furnishings.

==Trivia==
* The soundtrack shares a motif introduced in the Liyue portion of the [[Story Teaser#Special Story Teasers|Story Teaser]]: [[Teyvat Chapter Storyline Preview: Travail|Travail]].
* <section begin="MoonCup2" />The following soundtracks share Moon in One's Cup's 1st leitmotif ''(unofficial name)'':
** [[Moon in One's Cup]] (0:00)
** [[A Noble Sacrifice]] (2:23)<section end="MoonCup2" />
* <section begin=MoonCup />The following soundtracks share Moon in One's Cup's 2nd leitmotif ''(unofficial name)'':
** [[Moon in One's Cup]] (0:47)
** [[Maiden's Longing]] (0:00)
** [[Clear Sky Over Liyue]] (0:00)
** These soundtracks were based on one of the previous works of composer Yu-Peng Chen. His single ''[https://music.163.com/#/song?id=1315882006 {{zh|一杯月|zh_tl=One Cup of the Moon}}]'' was released in 2018 and had a similar name to the first soundtrack mentioned above. The shared melody between them was also used as the representative theme of Liyue in ''[[Teyvat Chapter Storyline Preview: Travail]]''.<section end=MoonCup />
